entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE, A SLIGHT CHANCE OF DRIZZLE AND FREEZING RAIN THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE AND FREEZING DRIZZLE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 50

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
